msg: If an AccessControlException is thrown reading the accessExternalEntity fall back to the default

msg: PDFBOX-1402 rename text alignment options; support justify alignment

author: markt
msg: Avoid an IllegalArgumentException when an AJP request body chunk larger than the socket read buffer is being read. This typically requires a larger than default AJP packetSize.
